name: Dr. Iving In Space
description:
Dr. Iving In Space is a concept project which is primarily a speed runner/platformer. The idea is to master each part of the level and obtain the fastest time as well as completing a level in under a certain number of deaths. It may look easy but prepare to die (and possibly smash your keyboard) many times over.

Feedback received from the game will be put towards another (hopefully better) project which is planned to be 2.5D made with the Unreal Engine.

There may be minor bugs in the game, they are being resolved and this is not an abandoned project by any means in its current form. If you spot something (other than a terrible game) please get in touch!

Warning

This game is immature and does have minor bad language and adult themes.

Controls

Navigation in Menu - Arrows and Space Bar

In game

Movement - Arrow Keys

Double Jump/Jump - Space Bar

Fire poop - V

Roll - Press Down
